citations.narrative:
Dogs at this facility are provided with supervised access to an enclosed outdoor play space for a period of up to 20
minutes, multiple times daily. At the time of the inspection, two dogs were in this outdoor space. Potable water was not
made available to these dogs, but they appeared comfortable and when water was provided, the dogs did not drink from
the receptacle. The facility must ensure that potable water is continuously available to dogs. Correct by March 13, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
Dogs at this facility are provided with supervised access to an enclosed outdoor play space for a period of up to 20 
minutes, multiple times daily. At the time of the inspection, two dogs were in this outdoor space. Potable water was not 
made available to these dogs, but they appeared comfortable and when water was provided, the dogs did not drink from 
the receptacle. The facility must ensure that potable water is continuously available to dogs. Correct by March 13, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
